posts.name: jim
posts.cooked: My team is thinking about using two RSLs this season. What is the proper way to do this? There is only one terminal on the RoboRio for the RSL . Do we connect into the RoboRio and then slice off to the second RSL ?

posts.name: neev dadhania
posts.cooked: yes, that is how most do it, but i am curious: why? is it just for symmetry?

posts.name: jim
posts.cooked: I have not idea why. It is something they want to do and it is easier to let it happen then argue with a imbecile. (other mentor)

posts.name: Skye Leake
posts.cooked: Pick your battles kind of moment huh?

posts.name: Dilpreet Singh Randhawa
posts.cooked: Some robot designs can make it so there’s not a singular location for an RSL visible from all angles. A second RSL can be helpful in a situation like that to avoid issues with inspection/being legal in match play.

posts.name: Patricia Beekman
posts.cooked:
A second RSL can be helpful in a situation like that to avoid issues with inspection/being legal in match play.

And also for, y’know, safety .

user_custom_fields.user_field_4: Way too invested in strategy shenanigans

posts.custom_user_title: Way too invested in strategy shenanigans

posts.name: Dilpreet Singh Randhawa
posts.cooked:
Psssshhhh. I’ll know the robot is enabled when it smacks me in the face. Everyone knows the RSLs are for being pretty and blinky.

/s

posts.name: MrBasse
posts.cooked:
There shouldn’t be issues with inspection or legality for almost any location on a robot.  It only has to be easily visible from 3 feet away and only on one side of the robot.

Some people just like to make robots more blinky.

posts.name: David | 8866 A | Manufacturing+Hardware
posts.cooked: I know we wanna do it cause we just love RSLs so much, can’t speak for other teams though.

posts.name: Marcus Kauffman
posts.cooked:
I made a circuit board that connected the RSL port on the roborio to up to 10 lights.

Just for fun; illegal in competition

R709:

A. mounted on the ROBOT such that it is easily visible while standing 3 ft. (~ 100 cm) away from at least one side of the ROBOT.

posts.name: neev dadhania
posts.cooked: i know that my strange, industrial-obsessed 7yo self woulda loved to have an RSL somewhere

It also means you can do fuel RSL !

IMGP8681 1920×1277 159 KB

IMGP8681 1920×1277 159 KB

IMGP8681 1920×1277 159 KB

posts.name: FrankJ
posts.cooked: The visibility requirement for the RSL is three ft in one direction. Not 360 degrees. (R709) Although the more is better from a practical matter. The rule about one wire per connector is for the PDB/ PDH . Though doing it elsewhere might irritate your RI . Lots of other ways to splice wiring for the RSL together.

posts.name: jim
posts.cooked: After talking about it more. The reason is the limelight is going to be near it. By putting two RSLs, 1 on each side it should not affect the Limelight.
